mapper.update: MERGE INTO SU_FAVO T1 USING (SELECT #{goodId} AS good_id ,#{id} AS id ,#{entpId} AS entp_id ,#{goodName} AS good_name ,(select good_price from su_pne where good_id = #{goodId} and entp_id = #{entpId}) AS good_price ,#{goodNum} AS good_num ,#{entpName} AS entp_name FROM DUAL ) T2 ON (T1.good_id = T2.good_id and T1.entp_id = T2.entp_id and T1.id = T2.id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T1.good_name = T2.good_name ,T1.good_price = T2.good_price ,T1.good_num = T2.good_num ,T1.entp_name = T2.entp_name WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (T1.good_id,T1.id,T1.entp_id,T1.good_name,T1.good_price ,T1.good_num,T1.entp_name) VALUES (T2.good_id,T2.id,T2.entp_id,T2.good_name,T2.good_price ,T2.good_num,T2.entp_name)
